text:
I suggest to consider adding the Cerebellum atlas from Diedrichsen lab. This is because the UKBiobank uses it extensively, prompting more and more investigators to need the atlas.

http://www.diedrichsenlab.org/imaging/propatlas.htm
title: Add Diedrichsen Cerebellum atlas

text:
It has been used in UKbiobank Imaging to generate the cerebellum IDPs... It
can't be that hidden from the world.

2017-11-06 22:18 GMT+01:00 Gael Varoquaux <notifications@github.com>:
